legacy.full_text:
School is back in session at Hong Kong Polytechnic University. Some repairs are still going on. Watch to see what PolyU looks like now.
#PolyU 
https://t.co/MaGnuoQWOk https://t.co/jTYLJoziGw

Talked with students there. Some feel safer by tightened security measures. Some annoyed by inconvenience. Some blame the government for causing all the chaos. Some hope the new semester can be better.
